Bellevue.Nexus (building): Nexus is an under construction residential high-rise building in Seattle, Washington. When completed in 2019, the 40-story, 440-foot (130 m) tower will have 382 condominiums, retail space, and a parking garage for 316 vehicles. Nexus is located at 1200 Howell Street in the Denny Triangle neighborhood of Seattle, adjacent to Interstate 5.
